I interviews have officially jumped the shark. In this video, we explore the absurdity of instant AI interviews like "Joy" — from applying to the Costco food court as a hot dog, to watching corporate recruiting tech spiral into full-on humiliation rituals.

These bots are reading resumes, faking empathy, and sending canned summaries to hiring managers — all while pretending to care. But is this really the future of work? Is replacing recruiters with ChatGPT in a trench coat the best we've got?

From job gap judgment to c
title: AI INTERVIEWS ARE HUMILIATING WORKERS!
